# Assignment 1 

------------------------------------------------------------------------

**T** - *Being on time*  
**T_not** - *Not being on time*  
**S** - *Change in Scope*  
**S_not** - *No change in scope*  

> Defining the probabilities from the probability tree  


::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_6a2d47ca56380739f5221c5280c01d62'}

```{.r .cell-code}
P_S <- 0.3 
P_S_not <- 0.7  
P_T_given_S <- 0.2  
P_T_given_S_not <- 0.6  
```
:::


**P(T ∩ S)** - *P_T_and_S*  
**(T ∩ ¬S)** - *P_T_and_S_not*  
**P(¬T ∩ S)** - *P_not_T_and_S*  
**P(¬T ∩ ¬S)** - *P_not_T_and_S_not*  


::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_d51398cb3e6cfaf07eca7f3fee8157a9'}

```{.r .cell-code}
P_T_and_S <- P_S * P_T_given_S  
P_T_and_S_not <- P_S_not * P_T_given_S_not  
P_not_T_and_S <- P_S * (1 - P_T_given_S)  
P_not_T_and_S_not <- P_S_not * (1 - P_T_given_S_not)  
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_a7378d334235344eb70b382153ef5fc0'}

```{.r .cell-code}
P_T_and_S  
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> [1] 0.06
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
P_T_and_S_not  
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> [1] 0.42
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
P_not_T_and_S  
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> [1] 0.24
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
P_not_T_and_S_not  
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> [1] 0.28
```
:::
:::


> Sum of all probabilities  


::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_8a1882c90e92790c3b150a05ea65379e'}

```{.r .cell-code}
probabilities_sum <- P_T_and_S + P_T_and_S_not + P_not_T_and_S + P_not_T_and_S_not
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_e807b3b20ed930c0eb8931bc9f3cefce'}

```{.r .cell-code}
probabilities_sum
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> [1] 1
```
:::
:::

# Assignment 3

------------------------------------------------------------------------

> Information from the Application


::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-10_f0c97b8e30c97b3b8448e53ecb81baa8'}

```{.r .cell-code}
P_B_given_A = 0.97
P_B_given_A_not = 0.01
P_A = 0.04
P_A_not <- 1 - P_A

P_A_not
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> [1] 0.96
```
:::
:::


> We are required to find:  
- Probability that the product is faulty given that the alarm has gone off -- **P_A_given_B**  
- Probability that the product is not faulty given that the alarm has gone off -- **P_A_not_given_B**



::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-11_21a4186aad17789f8bfd72e84a246b57'}

```{.r .cell-code}
P_B = P_B_given_A * P_A + P_B_given_A_not * P_A_not

P_B
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> [1] 0.0484
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-12_5c3702706744bfbeb1e6ed4d410f0179'}

```{.r .cell-code}
P_A_given_B = (P_B_given_A * P_A) / P_B

P_A_given_B
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> [1] 0.8016529
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-13_e4c2a6b75735190199af98536545c117'}

```{.r .cell-code}
P_A_not_given_B = (P_B_given_A_not * P_A_not) / P_B

P_A_not_given_B
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> [1] 0.1983471
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-14_05aa66a422e01416cf3ccf88e6468cd3'}

```{.r .cell-code}
cat("# P_A_not_given_B =", P_A_not_given_B * 100, "% that the product is flawless and a")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> # P_A_not_given_B = 19.83471 % that the product is flawless and a
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}

```
